item.title: Giant Field Rats
item.description: Traits: Animal Intelligence Group Movement Ravenous Defensive Reset: No Speech: APL: 1 Strength Bonus: 3 Healed By: Earth Offensives: ​ Ability to Heal x2- On a TEN count [one I feed, two I feed, etc…] a Giant Field Rat can heal if there is a food source available [Food sources include, Plot designated garbage dumps, other Plot designated feeding areas, grain piles, etc.] ​ 3Wither Limb ​ 1 Weaken Weapons: Small Weapon- 2 Disease, Short/Longsword – 3 Disease
